item.title: Stick It to the Stickman launches in Early Access on August 18
item.content:encoded:
• PC

New demo now available.

Roguelike beat ’em up game Stick It to the Stickman will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 18, publisher Devolver Digital and developer Free Lives announced. A new demo is available now.

Here is an overview of the game, via Devolver Digital:

About

Stick it to the Stickman is a physics-based brawler where you fight minimum wage stickmen to become a CEO. Choose from hundreds of unique moves to construct the perfect combat machine, then battle your way to the top of the corporate ladder.

Fight other CEOs for the prestige of employing the CEO with the biggest muscles. Perform dubiously legal tasks critical to expanding the company, including stealing cars, suppressing protestors and kidnapping building inspectors—all in the name of profit.

Key Features

  • Wild physics-based stickman combat featuring a vast array of brutal weapons and over-the-top special moves, including fireballs, chainsaws and katanas.
  • Combines multiple gameplay styles including platforming, brawling, autobattling, delivery, car theft, free-running and kicking people out of windows.
  • Play solo or with a ‘friend’ and defeat hordes of red stickmen to secure your promotion. But be warned: everybody else wants the job too.

Watch a new trailer below.

Early Access Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/stick-it-to-the-stickman-launches-in-early-access-on-august-18

item.title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation for Switch launches this fall in Asia with English language support
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Physical edition pre-orders open August 7.

eastasiasoft will release the Switch version of Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation both physically and digitally in Asia this fall, the publisher announced. It will include English and Traditional Chinese text, as well as English and Japanese voice-overs.

The physical edition will be available for pre-order via Play-Asia starting August 7 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET. Only 2,000 Limited Editions will be produced, which include the game, manual, soundtrack CD, art book, Joy-Con stickers, mini case, acrylic standees, and a numbered certificate in a collector’s box for $59.99. A $39.99 standard edition will also be available. (You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.)

The Switch versions of the Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth trilogy were originally planned to release in the west, but were cancelled after being informed the games “did not comply with Nintendo Guidelines.” The PlayStation 4 versions, however, are due out both physically and digitally in the west on September 30. eastasiasoft has already announced plans to release both Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 and Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation for Switch in Asia.

Here is an overview of the game, via eastasiasoft:

About

It’s time to Nep-Nep like it’s 1989. Neptune’s been sucked into an alternate dimension of Gamindustri! In order for her to escape from this late ’80s world, Neptune will have to collect enough shares to open up the path to her own dimension. Sounds easy enough… except a nefarious alliance called the Seven Sages wants to rid Gamindustri of all CPUs, including Neptune!

Forging cross-dimensional friendships, will Neptune be able to defeat the Seven Sages, save this alternate dimension and get back to her own, or will she be stuck in the ‘80s forever? Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V GENERATION is a remake of the series’ third entry, now with all prior extras included and packed with the fourth-wall-breaking antics that make these JRPGs so endearing to fans!

Key Features

  • Meet old and new characters as you guide Neptune through an alternate dimension inspired by gaming in the ’80s!
  • Help Neptune collect enough shares to save this version of Gamindustri and return to her own.
  • Customize attack combinations with up to 5 moves, opening up new strategies to use against enemies!
  • Use Plans to customize the experience by altering dungeon treasures, enemy difficulty and more.
  • Enjoy an expanded Stella’s Dungeon mini-game, this time allowing her to bring friends along for support!

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Gameplay Trailer

Opening Movie



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/hyperdimension-neptunia-rebirth3-v-generation-for-switch-launches-this-fall-in-asia-with-english-language-support

item.title: Sakuna: Hinuka Junreitan announced for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

From TOHO Games, Edelweiss, and G2 Studios.

Publishers TOHO Games and Edelweiss, and developer G2 Studios have announced Sakuna: Hinuka Junreitan, a “rice cultivation simulation x exploration battle RPG” coming to PC via Steam, iOS, and Android as a free-to-play title with item-based microtransactions. A release date was not announced.

It should be noted that this title is separate from Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Creation, a spin-off of Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin announced by publisher Marvelous and developer Edelweiss back in November 2024.

A teaser visual for Sakuna: Hinuka Junreitan was released alongside the launch of the game’s official website and Twitter account, which features Sakuna (voiced by Naomi Oozora) in a new outfit, and new character Hinuka (voiced by Machico).

Further details were not announced.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/sakuna-hinuka-junreitan-announced-for-pc-ios-and-android
